scripts.assets: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run assets:install
scripts.cmd:install:all: npm-run-all -c exec doctrine:migrate assets encore:dev lint:all
scripts.doctrine:fixtures: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run doctrine:fixtures:load
scripts.doctrine:migrate: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run doctrine:migrations:migrate
scripts.doctrine:schema:update: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run doctrine:schema:update
scripts.exec: npm-run-all -c bdd:mariadb docker:getpull-image docker:deploy docker:waiting docker:ls
scripts.labstag:geocode:install: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run labstag:geocode:install
scripts.labstag:guard-route: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run labstag:guard-route
scripts.labstag:install: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run labstag:install
scripts.labstag:workflows-show: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run labstag:workflows-show
scripts.lint:all: npm-run-all -c cmd:validate_outdated cmd:php-cs-fixer_phpcbf eslint:fix lint:stylelint:fix lint:twig lint:container lint:yaml lint:phpaudit lint:markdown rector
scripts.lint:container: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run lint:container
scripts.lint:php-cs-fixer: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run php-cs-fixer
scripts.lint:php-cs-fixer:dry: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run php-cs-fixer:dry
scripts.lint:phpcbf: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpcbf
scripts.lint:phpcs: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpcs
scripts.lint:phpcs:error: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpcs:error
scripts.lint:phpcs:warning: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpcs:warning
scripts.lint:phpdoc: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpdoc
scripts.lint:phploc: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phploc
scripts.lint:phpmd: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpmd
scripts.lint:phpmnd: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpmnd
scripts.lint:phpstan:0: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:0
scripts.lint:phpstan:1: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:1
scripts.lint:phpstan:2: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:2
scripts.lint:phpstan:3: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:3
scripts.lint:phpstan:4: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:4
scripts.lint:phpstan:5: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:5
scripts.lint:phpstan:6: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:6
scripts.lint:phpstan:7: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:7
scripts.lint:phpstan:8: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:8
scripts.lint:phpstan:9: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpstan:9
scripts.lint:twig: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run lint:twig templates
scripts.lint:yaml: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run lint:yaml
scripts.messenger:consume: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run messenger:consume
scripts.messenger:stop: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run messenger:stop
scripts.rector: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run rector
scripts.rector:dry: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run rector-dry
scripts.test:behat: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run behat
scripts.test:phpunit: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run phpunit
scripts.translation:en: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run translation:en
scripts.translation:fr: docker exec -i $($npm_package_config_phpfpm) symfony composer run translation:fr
